data.name: SearchVaultPlaceholder
data.comment: Placeholder text for search input field

data.name: SearchHelpText
data.value: Introdu un termen de căutare, acesta poate fi numele serviciului, descrierea sau adresa de e-mail.
data.comment: Help text explaining what can be searched

data.name: SearchTooShortMessage
data.value: Te rugăm să introduci mai multe caractere
data.comment: Message when search term is too short

data.name: NoResultsFoundMessage
data.comment: Message when no search results are found

data.name: SearchingMessage
data.comment: Message when search is in progress
